title: Found: Jank Components Beer Cage, EDC Stan’s Dart Add-On, Steel Idler Pulley and more
content:
Jank Components are a small outfit in Bellingham, Washington, quietly manufacturing some super useful on-bike storage solutions. Everything they make, from the Beer Cage, to the SWAT Box Pump Holder, to the Steel Idler Pulley for Forbidden Bikes, is made in-house by founders, Eric, Dario and Forrest. Here’s an assortment of niche Jank Components you

The post Found: Jank Components Beer Cage, EDC Stan’s Dart Add-On, Steel Idler Pulley and more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
